statements: DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 100 AND age > 50;
DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female' AND medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 2005 AND admission_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 101 AND visit_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND status = 'Scheduled';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE prescribing_physician = 'Dr. Smith' AND diagnosis = 'Flu';
